tls:text.tls:line: Zhòng Ní was staying in his home

sense.def: dwell at home; live in peace and quiet; stay at home opp. xíng 行 "be travelling".

tls:text.tls:line: and Zēngzǐ was in attendance.

sense.def: name of a confucianist philosopher

tls:text.tls:line: and Zēngzǐ was in attendance.

sense.def: be in polite attendance with a contextually determinate senior person

tls:text.tls:line: The Master said:

sense.def: our master; person in authority [Note that the [post-N] can never in fact be made explicit without breaking the rules of the grammar! CH]

tls:text.tls:line: The Master said:

sense.def: say: S

tls:text.tls:line: "The Former Kings were in command of ultimate moral authority and also the crucial Way

sense.def: the former kings; one series: 堯舜禹湯文武孝己

tls:text.tls:line: "The Former Kings were in command of ultimate moral authority and also the crucial Way

sense.def: have (figurative) possession of, be possessed of (e.g. the Way)

tls:text.tls:line: "The Former Kings were in command of ultimate moral authority and also the crucial Way

sense.def: perfect, consummate

tls:text.tls:line: "The Former Kings were in command of ultimate moral authority and also the crucial Way

sense.def: the highest form of virtue, true virtue, true inner power

tls:text.tls:line: "The Former Kings were in command of ultimate moral authority and also the crucial Way

sense.def: important, crucial; essential

tls:text.tls:line: "The Former Kings were in command of ultimate moral authority and also the crucial Way

sense.def: the (morally correct) Way; the proper non-substance-like abstract metaphysical principle ensuring that all is well in the world

tls:text.tls:line: and by these they instructed the people of the world.

sense.def: using this means> by this means> in this way; with the contextually determinate object, by use of the contextually determinate object/method (the pronominal object of the preposition is omitted)

tls:text.tls:line: and by these they instructed the people of the world.

sense.def: train and instruct; encourage people to pursue (a subject)

tls:text.tls:line: and by these they instructed the people of the world.

sense.def: all the world> everyone everywhere

tls:text.tls:line: The common people, as a result, lived in harmony.

sense.def: the common people of the contextually determinate place, the native people, the permanently resident people

tls:text.tls:line: The common people, as a result, lived in harmony.

sense.def: in conformity with the contextually determinate conditions N (should perhaps be moved to THEREFORE)

tls:text.tls:line: The common people, as a result, lived in harmony.

sense.def: live in harmony with each other; be in perfect harmony

tls:text.tls:line: superiors and subordinates were without resentment,

sense.def: the leadership; those who are of superior rank, those in high social or political positions;

tls:text.tls:line: superiors and subordinates were without resentment,

sense.def: a subordinate, a (public) servant; those below, the subjects; people of low status

tls:text.tls:line: superiors and subordinates were without resentment,

sense.def: intense resentment; relations of mutual resentment

tls:text.tls:line: do you understand this well?"

sense.def: familiar, informal you

tls:text.tls:line: do you understand this well?"

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:text.tls:line: do you understand this well?"

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: do you understand this well?"

sense.def: final question particle after verbal sentence 管仲儉乎？"Was Guǎnzhòng stingy?"

tls:text.tls:line: Zēngzǐ stepped away from the mat and said:

sense.def: leave the mat one is sitting on and stand up next to it (see XJ 1 for the decisive example which proves that standing up is indeed involved)

tls:text.tls:line: Zēngzǐ stepped away from the mat and said:

sense.def: withdraw from (a place N)

tls:text.tls:line: Zēngzǐ stepped away from the mat and said:

sense.def: mat used as a seat

tls:text.tls:line: Zēngzǐ stepped away from the mat and said:

sense.def: say: S

tls:text.tls:line: how could I be qualified to understand that properly?"

sense.def: how on earth? How on earth could you/he/I? 回何敢死？ 丘何敢乎？何足憂？

tls:text.tls:line: how could I be qualified to understand that properly?"

sense.def: be capable of V-ing (NOT: be sufficient to V with)

tls:text.tls:line: how could I be qualified to understand that properly?"

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:text.tls:line: how could I be qualified to understand that properly?"

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: "As for filial piety,

sense.def: "Now,", "In fact," introducing new subject for the discourse, and introducing non-narrative theoretical discourse.

tls:text.tls:line: "As for filial piety,

sense.def: loving respect for one's parents and ancestors (see also VIRTUE)

tls:text.tls:line: it is the basis of virtue,

sense.def: the highest form of virtue, true virtue, true inner power

tls:text.tls:line: it is the basis of virtue,

sense.def: NP-Y is part of NP-X 仁之本

tls:text.tls:line: it is the basis of virtue,

sense.def: what is basic and crucial; the basic and crucial feature; basic features; primary consideration

tls:text.tls:line: it is that from which teaching arises.

sense.def: training; drill; moral instruction; instruction

tls:text.tls:line: it is that from which teaching arises.

sense.def: coming forth from, from

tls:text.tls:line: it is that from which teaching arises.

sense.def: originate; come to emerge; be naturally found in (of inanimate subjects), occur naturally in

tls:text.tls:line: Sit down again,

sense.def: again (as in 復戰 "fight again, renew battle".(often of reverting to an original state:) again (失而復得"lose but regain again") occasionally and rarely adversative: on the contrary; (with negatives, not) any more, not any longer; but again

tls:text.tls:line: Sit down again,

sense.def: sit (i.e. kneel!) down!

tls:text.tls:line: I will tell you about this."

sense.def: I (unmarked, non-contrastive, weak)

tls:text.tls:line: I will tell you about this."

sense.def: report to; notify (someone), let someone know

tls:text.tls:line: I will tell you about this."

sense.def: familiar, informal you

tls:text.tls:line: "One's trunk and limbs, hair and skin,

sense.def: body as a whole; especially the main trunk as opposed to the head; body as embodying the person

tls:text.tls:line: "One's trunk and limbs, hair and skin,

sense.def: limb, limbs; body as constituted by its parts

tls:text.tls:line: "One's trunk and limbs, hair and skin,

sense.def: hair; human hair on the head

tls:text.tls:line: "One's trunk and limbs, hair and skin,

sense.def: the skin of humans

tls:text.tls:line: one receives them from father and mother;

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it; you

sense.def: filial piety, devotion to one's living and dead forbears

sense.def: beginning, the initial state as a dynamic state motivating what happens after that beginning; proper beginning; original cause, Greek: archē;

tls:text.tls:line: To establish oneself as a person and practise the Way,

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:text.tls:line: To establish oneself as a person and practise the Way,

sense.def: enact; implement as an official; carry out as a morally responsible agent; put into practice, practise, carry out; operate according to; implement (a law) and apply it to

tls:text.tls:line: and spread one's fame to later generations,

sense.def: spread N1 in or to the place or time N2

tls:text.tls:line: and spread one's fame to later generations,

sense.def: reputation; (good or bad) name;

tls:text.tls:line: and spread one's fame to later generations,

sense.def: in relation to, with respect to; in the matter of

tls:text.tls:line: and spread one's fame to later generations,

sense.def: future generations, posterity

tls:text.tls:line: to make thereby one's father and mother illustrious,

sense.def: using this means> by this means> in this way; with the contextually determinate object, by use of the contextually determinate object/method (the pronominal object of the preposition is omitted)

tls:text.tls:line: to make thereby one's father and mother illustrious,

sense.def: cause to be illustrious; promote reputation of

tls:text.tls:line: to make thereby one's father and mother illustrious,

sense.def: father and mother; parents

tls:text.tls:line: it is the last part of filial piety.

sense.def: filial piety, devotion to one's living and dead forbears

sense.def: the end; successful conclusion

tls:text.tls:line: "Now as for filial piety,

sense.def: "Now,", "In fact," introducing new subject for the discourse, and introducing non-narrative theoretical discourse.

tls:text.tls:line: "Now as for filial piety,

sense.def: filial piety, devotion to one's living and dead forbears

tls:text.tls:line: it begins with serving one's parents,

sense.def: serve (as minister or aide, as one state another etc.), be in the service of; enter the services of; side with; specifically: serve and cultivate through gifts; attend to

tls:text.tls:line: it begins with serving one's parents,

sense.def: parents, one's parents

tls:text.tls:line: it has its middle part in serving one's ruler,

sense.def: serve (as minister or aide, as one state another etc.), be in the service of; enter the services of; side with; specifically: serve and cultivate through gifts; attend to

tls:text.tls:line: it has its middle part in serving one's ruler,

sense.def: the ruler as being primarily administratively in charge of people

tls:text.tls:line: and it has its final part in establishing one's person."

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

sense.def: run (as follows); say something to the effect that S 不曰

tls:text.tls:line: "Remember your ancestors,

sense.def: Duke of Zhōu (reigned 1042 - 1036)ALTERNATIVE NAMES: Wén 文, Dàn 旦 PARENTS: The fourth son of >Zhōu Wén wáng 周文王and his wife Tài Sì 太姒 WIVES: ?CHILDREN: Father of >Bó Qín 伯禽, Jún Chén 君陳, and six other sons.6. NOTE that the following chronology is uncertain. 1045 took part in the campaign against the Shāng 商. 1043 he is said to pray for the health of the > Wǔ wáng 武王. Described in the SHANGSHU, chapter Jīn téng. 1042 - 1036 ruled the empire instead of the young king Cheng, and defeated a revolt of Guǎn shu1 管叔, Cǎi shū 蔡叔, and Wǔ gēng 武庚 against the Zhou rule. 1036 founded the eastern capital at Lu4o yì洛邑. 1022 died (according to ZZJN in 21st year of > Zhōu Chéng wáng 周成王 ) 7. -8. A. Highly estimated already by Confucius. 久矣吾不復夢見周公！ How much time has passed where I have not seen the Duke of Zhōu<> any more<> in a dream<>!" （ LY 7.5) B. In Han shu gu jin ren biao he is listed among 15 sheng ren 聖人 (Sages).

sense.def: jump up and down in extreme grief

tls:text.tls:line: He beats his breast, jumps, laments and weeps,

sense.def: wail and weep

tls:text.tls:line: accompanies them (on their last way) with grief,

sense.def: accompany some way upon departure

tls:text.tls:line: divines about their burial place

sense.def: divine by the use of cracks in a turtle shell;

tls:text.tls:line: He builds an ancestral temple for them

sense.def: produce (something N2) (for someone N1)

tls:text.tls:line: He builds an ancestral temple for them

sense.def: ancestral temples, temples for the ancestors (symbols of the nation, see this word under NATION)

tls:text.tls:line: and sacrifices to them in the way in which one sacrifices to ghosts.

sense.def: make (large-scale) offerings of wine (to the gods in order to seek their blessings)

tls:text.tls:line: and lingers in thought on them at the appropriate time.

sense.def: be preoccupied by; linger in thought on; reflect on, be mindful of, think about

tls:text.tls:line: When they live, he's concerned with loving care and diligent respect,

sense.def: be alive; remain alive

tls:text.tls:line: When they live, he's concerned with loving care and diligent respect,

sense.def: have as one's main concern; make something one's own business; show concern for

tls:text.tls:line: When they live, he's concerned with loving care and diligent respect,

sense.def: love and respect; loving respect

tls:text.tls:line: when they are dead, he's concerned with mourning and grief,

sense.def: be dead

tls:text.tls:line: when they are dead, he's concerned with mourning and grief,

sense.def: have as one's main concern; make something one's own business; show concern for

tls:text.tls:line: when they are dead, he's concerned with mourning and grief,

sense.def: grief in general, all kinds of grief

tls:text.tls:line: so the basis of the people is completely realised,

sense.def: what is basic and crucial; the basic and crucial feature; basic features; primary consideration

tls:text.tls:line: so the basis of the people is completely realised,

sense.def: be realised completely

tls:text.tls:line: the meaning of death and life is completely provided,

sense.def: life on earth; one's dying or staying alive

tls:text.tls:line: the meaning of death and life is completely provided,

sense.def: be completely provided
